title: AI and Machine Learning in Cycling Safety

quizzes.question: What percentage of road fatalities in the European Union are cyclists?
quizzes.explanation: Cyclists account for 9% of all road fatalities in the European Union, highlighting the need for improved safety measures.

quizzes.question: How do AI and machine learning contribute to cycling safety?
options: By providing entertainment features for cyclists
By monitoring cyclist behavior and preventing accidents
By increasing the speed of bicycles
By reducing the cost of bicycles
quizzes.explanation: AI and machine learning enhance cycling safety by monitoring cyclist behavior and preventing accidents through real-time data exchange and automated responses.

quizzes.question: What is the purpose of the Lane Patrol tool?
options: To automate the assessment of cycling infrastructure
quizzes.explanation: Lane Patrol uses computer vision and deep learning to automate the assessment of cycling infrastructure, improving safety by detecting hazards and classifying lane types.
